You have been chosen.

Imbued with divine power and equipment, you carry the will of your deity on your shoulders. Thrust into holy warfare, you will claim space and time itself for your patron.

Stardust Symphony is a 2D brawler. Local multiplayer allows you to battle your friends. If you don't have any friends around (or even if you do) enter a bot battle to test your reflexes.
